text: qal 'ibrahym: afabsrtm btdbr maa kuntum taebudun min al'asnam alty la tusmie wala tanfae wala tdr, 'antum wabawukum al'aqdamun min qblkm? fa'iina ma tebdwnhm min dun allah 'aeda'an ly, lkn rabu alealamin wmalk 'amrihim hu wahdah aldhy aebdh. hu aladhi khalaqani fi 'ahsan surat fahu yrshdny 'iilaa masalih aldunya walakhrt, wahu aladhi ynem ely balteam walshrab, wa'iidha asabny marad fahu aldhy yashfyny wyeafyny mnh, wahu aladhi yumituni fi aldyna bqbd rwhy, thuma yhyyny yawm alqyamt, la yuqadar ealaa dhlk ahd swah, waladhi 'atmae 'an yatajawaz ean dhnby yawm aljza'
